name: Granny Jump - Steep, Crazy Dive, lady, bungee
name_original: Granny Jump - Steep, Crazy Dive, lady, bungee
description:
Granny Smith loves Jumping, Dive and bungee. He want a A parachute jump from a cliff. Jump to the end of the cliff safely!

Lady Smith is a fast-paced racing platformer filled with spectacular crashes and amazing stunts. Jump, glide, swing and smash your way through hand-crafted levels in a lush country setting. Just be sure to land on your feet!

FEATURES:
- Spectacular physics – Granny uses some of the most advanced destruction physics in Jumping games. Crash through air-conditions and windows and watch the pieces fly all over!

- Dazzling visuals – Each level is like a fanciful, storybook.

- Intuitive controls – Help Granny pull off crazy moves with screen touching controls – perfect for both tablets and phones.

- Vintage replays – Watch your best runs in retro movie style with cool camera angles and slow-motion effects!

- More than 36 levels are waiting for you to complete!


How TO PLAY:
- Tap the left side of screen to move granny to the left, and tap the other the move the the other direction

- Tap the granny when she fall in to the red area to open the parachute!

- Land on the target platform carefully, otherwise, game over!
